short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boostlingo AI Pro: Capture, transcribe, and translate audio in any tab, seamlessly. Elevate productivity with real-time results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boostlingo AI Pro delivers high-quality translations using AI captioning to expand communication, offering dependable speech-to-text to support diverse communities. Effortlessly convert spoken words into written text with live captioning during meetings, events, or conferences to improve communication among all participants no matter what language they speak. Boostlingo AI Pro delivers precise real-time translated captions, allowing users to follow along in their preferred language.
